apixaban_dosing: No dose adjustment for mild/moderate renal impairment; use with caution in severe renal impairment; VKA preferred over LMWH/DOACs if creatinine clearance <30 mL/min.
dalteparin_dosing: Dose modifications per product label and investigator discretion; adjust by 500 IU or 1,000 IU increments/decrements based on weight, renal function, and clinical events (bleeding or thrombosis).
